comment: Awful teacher. She could care less about your grade & how youre doing in the class. Shes very irritated with slower students and doesnt care to help them catch up. She moves at one pace. A fast pace and if youre not fast you get left behind. She doesnt want to meet students where they are but rather them meet her where she is. Fluent.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Extremely knowledgable on everything in the spanish world and extremely talented at getting information across!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Awful! DO NOT TAKE!! She is so rude to students and it is very clear that she doesn't care about your success in her class. She gets impatient so easy to where it seems like she is bipolar. This class was too hard for spanish. Would not recommend...
Horrible teacher, yells at students. She barks at you when you ask a question. HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO NOT TAKE HER CLASS. Not good if Spanish isn't your first language.

GREAT INSTRUCTOR, but don't slack! Needed this class to fulfill requirement, but I did actually enjoy the class! Professor Naderi is a very smart lady and knows her stuff... SHOW UP TO CLASS and if you're not going to be there let her know before and she will work with you!

I love this teacher. She is very passionate about what she teaches. I got a B in her 1001 class and now taking her again for 1002.  She keeps it interesting and fun. Don't be disrespectful in class (like texting on your phone). You are paying to be there, so don't waste it! Slackers/not show up ever type will not succeed.

I had her at 8am and she kept me awake. She's pretty funny and she makes Spanish easy. She does a lot of practice so you get it. She's really helpful. She speaks Spanish kinda fast and it's hard to catch everything she's saying. You gotta write compositions and her tests are kinda hard but she's a good teacher.

Professor Naderi is definitely one of the most difficult professors to read. She does not use D2L at all, so you never know where you stand with your grade. She never responds to e-mails and is sometimes hard to approach in class. Learned a lot & she can be a lot of fun, just not the best "class setting".

Professor naderi is a great instructor. She is direct, but wants you to learn the material and be able to use it. She doesn't just hand out good grades-- you earn them! Don't slack, study, and you'll do well

She is incredibly ruthless and will yell at you for no reason. She gets mad very easily for no reason. She uses the book but does't actually teach you anything out of it. Everything you need to know for tests she "teaches" you by showing you a video of grammar man or telling you to look at it yourself.

Profe Naderi is one of the worst professors I have ever had. I was looking forward to this class, but had taken SPA 1001 elsewhere, and was behind. She was unhelpful, unforgiving, gave no assistance to students who were behind or rusty, spoke almost exclusively in Spanish, and called on unwilling students at random. I dreaded her class every day.

Fantastic teacher!!! I would recommend her a thousand times over. She is incredibly funny, and interested in her students' success. However, she is very easily agitated when it comes to cell phone usage or sleeping. Don't take her class if you are a slacker.

Professor Naderi was a fantastic instructor! Her instructions are clear, she's flexible to the class's need, and she really knows her stuff. She often goes beyond the textbook to teach, as well. Great sense of humor, too! Take her!

Prof naderi was a great teacher. she helps you in you're understanding and gives you vocabulary and other expression to speak the "normal everyday conversational spanish" i think she is great. If only she taught 1002

Great proffessor!! She is very nice and has a clear passion for teaching!! Does homework, lots of extra credit, does fun activities in class, and does not care about accents!!! I have never missed a class!! Take her!!

Very good teacher. Must attend classes but she will teach you way more than you need to know to get an A on the test. If you pay attention in class you will not have any trouble. Tells you everything you need to know to get an A in the class. Not very much homework.

Got an A+ with no prior Spanish instruction. She speaks mostly English, but she makes sure you understand what she says when she speaks Spanish. She is very approachable and cares about your progress if you have any concerns. I wish she were teaching 1002!!

the syllabus was not very helpful. This however worked out to be to the class advantage. I learned all the material before in my 1001/1002 classes but i still struggled to make a decent grade. There's mmany chances to make a good grade. There are Compostions and offer bonus points for exams. still...i made a C.

This Professor was amazing. I don't know what the other rater was saying about her only speaking Spanish, she mostly speaks English. She tests exactly what she teaches and she also teaches you how to communicate with native speakers by telling you slang words that she doesnt test. If you want to learn Spanish and a chance for an easy A, Take her!

Dr. Naderi is a very nice lady. She tries to assist her students. She really wants her students to know and understand the language. She does speaking exercises a lot, no quizzes, and takes attendance. Does required testing, homework, and oral presentations. She teaches modern words and slang words for things and uses commericals and the news.GREAT
I had a boss like this teacher once: overweight, short-tempered, elitist.  If you like these things, jump at the chance to take her.  If not, run.
All short-answer questions on tests.  She tries to be helpful, but sometimes visibly gets annoyed with slow students.
